comment:
Online drammers club pour. Great maritime salty, smoky, spicy, and sweet balance.

Nose: Blackberries, Blueberries, Salted Caramel, White Chocolate, Raisins, Smoke, Sultanas, Apricots, Violets, Lavender, Vanilla, Cinnamon, Cherries, Orange, Butter Frosting, Lemon Cake, Salted Cod

Palate: Raisins, Smoke, Salted Caramel, Dark Chocolate, Milk Chocolate, Tar, Cherries, Flowers, Dried Fruit, Plums, Vanilla, White Chocolate, Salted Cod

Finish: Chocolate Covered Cherries, Salted Caramel, Strawberries, Dates, Salted Cod, Vanilla, White Chocolate
Peated not my thing, tried during Summerton Virtual Whisky Festival

Summerton Virtual Whisky Festival sample.

This is a nice peaty, sweet whisky.  Honey, berries and vanilla are the main notes behind the peat.  The aftertaste brings out a mild spiciness that I hadn’t really noticed before - cloves and chilli - but the main flavour is still that lovely warm, sweet peat.

This is a lovely dram.  I liked it enough to order a bottle during the festival.
